long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Report bugs in no time. Simply record bugs you spot directly from your browser and instantly generate video reports containing all the context engineers need to fix them. No more back-and-forth.

🆓  Free and open-source 🆓 
Spot is open-source and free, as part of the OpenReplay platform. We welcome all your contributions, check out our Github repo (https://github.com/openreplay/openreplay).

⚡ Fast ⚡
Instantly record and share bugs without writing detailed reproduction steps. Install Spot, pin it, and start recording bugs with a single click.

📋 Complete bug reports 📋
Spot produces complete bug reports in video format, capturing user actions, user agent data, console logs, errors, and network payloads to help diagnose issues effectively.

🤝 Collaborative 🤝
Designed for internal team use, Spot lets team members file bugs easily and share Spot recordings internally or publicly (no account required for viewers).

🔒 Privacy control 🔒
Control the access and visibility of your bug reports. For increased security, Spot can be self-hosted as part of the OpenReplay platform.

KEY FEATURES
🎯 Instant bug reporting: Record and report bugs instantly from where they happen, in your browser. Include audio and comments for comprehensive reports.
🔗 Effortless sharing: Copy the links of your Spot recordings. Manage access settings for internal or public viewing. Public links expire after two days for security.
👨‍💻 Team workspace: All Spot recordings, with their console logs, errors, network requests, and user agent data, are stored in a single space for easy team access and collaboration.
📝 Usage note: Only reporters need to install this extension to record and share bugs. Developers can view public recordings without having the extension installed.
🌐 Public sharing: Customers can report and publicly share bug recordings, accessible without an account.
🔧  Integrations: Share Spot recordings by pasting the recording link into any tracking or collaboration tool, like Slack, Teams, Jira or Linear.

GET STARTED FOR FREE IN SECONDS
1️⃣ Install Spot by clicking "Add to Chrome”.
2️⃣ Create a free account or log in to your existing OpenReplay account.
3️⃣ Pin Spot to your toolbar and navigate to any page where you wish to report bugs.
4️⃣ Click the Spot icon to record any bug and instantly share it with a secure link.

💬 If you encounter any issues or have any feedback about Spot, you can connect with us on our Slack community channel at https://slack.openreplay.com

🌟 Enjoy using Spot? You can help us by rating ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ and leaving a review for us. Your feedback supports our continuous improvement and helps others discover Spot.
